729962f-a.title: Richmond: Wright Street - Thompson Street
729962f-a.text:
Wright Street, at the N.E. corner of Thompson
Streeb, showing The Richmomd Photoplays Theatre.
April 19, 1929
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, at a later date, seen across a clearance on
the west side of tho street.
July 8, 1932
P. L. Sperr
729962f-a.folder: Wright Street & Thompson Street, Staten Island, NY
